name: Kosu and Taru
description:
The Sisters of Duality, Kosu and Taru, are trapped in a spaceship. To make their way out, they have to collaborate -- Kosu needs to break the blocks while Taru needs to build new blocks. Be careful not to run into each other, though, something odd will happen! 

Genre: 2-player puzzle platform game

Controls for Controllers: 

Move - Left-hand lock-stick

Aim for Blocks - Right-hand lock-stick

X - Jump

Reset - Triangle
